articles.title: Filipino hides in Israeli bomb shelter, survives Iran attack
articles.description: MANILA – The Philippine Embassy in Israel has assisted a Filipino worker who survived a missile attack from Iran that hit residential houses at Marom Nave Park in Ramat Gan City on Saturday. The female worker was inside a bomb shelter when the missile landed. She is temporarily staying at a…
articles.content:
Filipino workers (burred) assisted by the Philippine Embassy in Israel, which is locked in retaliatory missile attacks with Iran. (PH Embassy photo)

articles.title: 'Happy Father's Day, Papa': Royal children share 'before and after' photos with Prince William
articles.description: Prince William's three children, Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis, could be seen laughing and smiling in the photos as they hugged their father.
articles.content:
Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis have wished their "Papa", Prince William, a happy Father's Day.

articles.title: 1 dead, 4 injured in Chongqing after driver runs into crowd: district police
articles.description: A police statement alleged that a 38-year-old male driver, surnamed Xiong, repeatedly sounded his horn after being blocked by another vehicle, disturbing nearby residents.
articles.content:
CHONGQING: One person is dead and four others injured after a driver allegedly drove into a crowd in Chongqing, a city in southwestern China, on Saturday after onlookers reportedly criticised him for repeatedly sounding the horn on his car.

articles.title: Balinese community reeling as police continue search for those involved in fatal shooting of Melbourne man
articles.description: The community of a small Balinese village is reeling after a brutal attack on Saturday killed one Melbourne man and seriously injured another.
articles.content:
Villa Casa Satisya is down a small lane and surrounded by rice paddies.
It's one of only a handful of villas in this tranquil corner of Bali, but all around it more are going up.
It was here, just after midnight on Saturday, that a brutal attack took... [4910 chars]

articles.title: Iran FM accuses UN Security Council of ‘indifference’ over Israel attacks
articles.description: TEHRAN: Iran’s Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi slammed the United Nations Security Council on Sunday, accusing it of “indifference” over Israel’s deadly attacks on the Islamic republic.
articles.content:

articles.title: I'm quitting the UK and moving my kids to the other side of the world - my husband's in the top 1% of earners but we're still struggling
articles.description: After growing tired of struggling to stay afloat, Clare Fisher, 39, and her family have decided to uproot their lives from Barry, in Wales, to move halfway around the world for a 'better life'.
articles.content:
'We're leaving Wales and we're not coming back.'
